include_directories(..)
include_directories(.)
include_directories(include)

FILE(GLOB PathieCppSources src/*.cpp)
if (NOT TARGET pathie-cpp)
  add_library(pathie-cpp OBJECT ${PathieCppSources})
  find_package(Iconv)
  if(Iconv_FOUND)
    target_link_libraries(pathie-cpp ${Iconv_LIBRARIES} ${Iconv_LIBRARY})
  else(Iconv_FOUND)
    message(SEND_ERROR "Cannot find iconv libraries. Terminating.")
  endif(Iconv_FOUND)
endif()
